mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 gem each day.

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Gold Cannons.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

horde1.description: The Cerbery Bastion increases Cerbery production by 4 per week.
horde1.name: Cerbery Bastion

horde1Upgr.description: The Upg. Cerbery Bastion increases Cerbery Gold production by 4 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Upg. Cerbery Bastion

special1.description: The Statue of Hero increases one attack of visiting hero.
special1.name: Statue of Hero

special2.description: The Stables increases the land movement rate of any visiting hero.
special2.name: Stables

special3.description: The Brotherhood Of The Sword, earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.
special3.name: Brotherhood Of The Sword

special4.description: The Gold Tower, earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.
special4.name: Gold Tower

special5.description: The Gold Balls, earns your kingdom 1000 gold, 2 woods, 2 ores and 1 other resources per day.
special5.name: Gold Ball

special6.description: The Gold Portal allow travels between towns containing The Gold Portal or Castle Gate. Destination town must be unoccupied.
special6.name: Gold Portal

grail.description: The presence of the Gold Eyes increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases attack, defence, spell power and knowledge of all allied heroes by +2.
grail.name: Gold Eyes

dwellingLvl1.description: The Girl House allows you to recruit Nymph Girl.
dwellingLvl1.name: Girl House

dwellingLvl2.description: The Pegasus Tower allows you to recruit Teal Pegasi.
dwellingLvl2.name: Pegasus Tower

dwellingLvl3.description: The Cerberys Tower allows you to recruit Cerberys.
dwellingLvl3.name: Cerbery Tower

dwellingLvl4.description: The Barracks allow you to recruit Helenas.
dwellingLvl4.name: Barracks

dwellingLvl5.description: The Monastery allows you to recruite Ice Queens.
dwellingLvl5.name: Monastery

dwellingLvl6.description: The Training Grounds allows you to recruite Infernal Satanists.
dwellingLvl6.name: Training Grounds

dwellingLvl7.description: The Dragon Tower allows you to recruite Gigant Black Dragon.
dwellingLvl7.name: Dragon Tower

dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Upg. Girl House allows you to recruite Gold Girls.
dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Girl House

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Upg. Pegasus Tower allows you to recruite Yellow Pegasi.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Pegasus Tower

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Upg. Cerberys Tower allows you to recruite Cerbery Golds.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Cerbery Tower

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Upg. Barracks allows you to recruite Helenas.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Barracks

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Upg. Monastery allows you to recruite Michelles.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Monastery

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Upg. Training Grounds allows you to recruite Gold Satanists.
dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Training Grounds

dwellingUpLvl7.description: The Upg. Dragon Tower allows you to recruite Gigant BlackGold Dragons.
dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Dragon Tower
